Russian National Day observed 
    Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Russian ambassador to the DPRK Valery Denisov gave a party at the embassy on June 12 on the occasion of its National Day.
 Invited to the party were Ri Kwang Gun, minister of foreign trade, Ryo Chun Sok, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made at the party.
